page.title: 19Primary Schools in Ferryhill
page.content: There are 4 Primary Schools within our area. {Dean Bank Junior Mixed & Infant Head:Mrs.H.Wright.10 teachers.296 children.Built as 2 schools in 1907. {Broom Cottages Junior Mixed & Infant Head:Mr.R.Posslethwaite.10 teachers. 263 children. {Cleves Cross Junior Mixed & Infant Head:Mr.J.Hepplewhite.6 teachers.165 children.Opened 1973. {Ferryhill Station Junior Mixed & {Infant Head:Mr.J.Ward.4 teachers.119 children.Opened 1878. There are no Secondary Schools in the area covered by this survey.All 4 Primary Schools send children to Ferryhill Comprehensive School which lies to the west of our grid.
